constructor.name: Manager
constructor.description: Methods for all global actions that affect groups of media objects.

properties.name: this.stage
properties.description: Dimensions of the screen area to be used for the performance. Default 900x700. Properties: stage.w (width in px) and stage.h (height in px)

properties.name: this.bp
properties.description:
A bandpass filter applied to audio.
bp.freq() changes the center frequency.
bp.q() changes the q.
Both methods take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.echo
properties.description:
A feedback delay applied to outgoing audio.
echo.time() changes the delay time.
echo.fb() changes the feedback level.
echo.wet() changes the amount of signal routed through the delay
All methods take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.hall
properties.description:
A reverb applied to outgoing audio.
hall.size() changes the reverb's virtual room size.
hall.wet() changes the amount of signal passed into the reverb.
All methods take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.vol
properties.description:
A volume of outgoing audio.
vol.to() changes the outgoing volume level (0-1).
All methods take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.pan
properties.description:
Pan outgoing audio.
pan.to() changes the outgoing pan level (0-1).
All methods take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.sine
properties.description:
A sine generator.
sine.freq() changes the frequency
sine.vol() changes the volume (0-1)
sine.start()
sine.stop()
.freq() and .vol() take arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: this.noise
properties.description:
A noise generator.
noise.vol() changes the volume (0-1)
noise.start()
noise.stop()
.vol() takes arguments of (destination) or (destination,time) or (origin,destination,time)

properties.name: patterns
properties.description: An object containing wall window arrangements as x,y,w,h.

functions.name: deck
functions.description: Initialize and open all browser windows to use

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many total windows will be used

functions.name: google
functions.description: Google image search and use the results in a callback func. Should this be made into adding it was a photo with wall.see()?

constructor.name: Medium
constructor.description: Template for all DOM-based media items (video, audio, text, etc)

functions.name: size
functions.description: Resize this media element

functions.name: move
functions.description: Move this element

functions.name: kill
functions.description: Remove this element and destroy all references to it

functions.name: fade
functions.description: Set the element's opacity

functions.name: hide
functions.description: Make the element disappear, but do not remove it. A/V files will keep playing and making sound.

functions.name: show
functions.description: If the element is hidden, show it.

functions.name: toggle
functions.description: If the element is hidden, show it. If it's visible, hide it.

functions.name: bomb
functions.description: Remove the element after a certain period of time

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: delay in ms before destroying the element

functions.name: load
functions.description: Load an audio file via source string.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: name of .mp3 file in /media folder. For example, .load("piano") will load "/media/piano.mp3"

functions.name: play
functions.description: Play audio file

parameters.name: rate
parameters.description: Playback rate of audio file (0.25 - 4). DOES NOT CHANGE PITCH.

functions.name: stop
functions.description: Pause audio playback

functions.name: solo
functions.description: Mute all players except for the player in window 1. This is useful if .skip() is causing too many pops and clicks (a pop for each of 4 players).

functions.name: loop
functions.description: Turn audio looping

functions.name: unloop
functions.description: Turn audio looping off

functions.name: jump
functions.description: Scrub to location in audio file

functions.name: skip
functions.description: Loop audio between two points

functions.name: unskip
functions.description: Stop skipping the audio file

functions.name: speed
functions.description: Change the audio file's playback rate (does not change pitch!)

functions.name: vol
functions.description: Change the player's volume

functions.name: show
functions.description: Show all browser windows in this wall

functions.name: hide
functions.description: Hide all browser windows in this wall (but keep them associated with this wall)

functions.name: watch
functions.description: Add a film element to the wall

functions.name: hear
functions.description: Add an audio cassette element to the wall

functions.name: dj
functions.description: Add an invisible audio player that is routed through m.fx

functions.name: write
functions.description: Add a paper (text) element to the page

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: to write or .txt filename to read

functions.name: see
functions.description: Add an image canvas to the wall

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: filename (w/o file extension if a jpg, i.e. "mcluhan" not "mcluhan.jpg")

functions.name: gif
functions.description: Add a gif to the wall

functions.name: hack
functions.description: Add an embedded webpage (iframe) to the wall

functions.name: wiki
functions.description: Add an embedded wikipedia iframe to the wall

functions.name: say
functions.description: Add a digital text-to-speech voice

functions.name: explore
functions.description: Add a Google Map

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: Name of the place to map (i.e. "Arkansas")

functions.name: text
functions.description: Add a text message

functions.name: log
functions.description: Add a code log

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text to write or name of URL or file name

functions.name: scroll
functions.description: Scroll all windows to an x/y coordinate

functions.name: autoscroll
functions.description: Xray automatically is called when windows move

functions.name: kill
functions.description: Destroy this wall and return all windows to stack

functions.name: empty
functions.description: Remove all media elements and content from all windows in this wall

functions.name: xray
functions.description: Scroll each window according to the window's place on the screen

functions.name: scramble
functions.description: Scroll each window to a random position

functions.name: shape
functions.description: Move and resize the wall's windows to a new pattern arrangement

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Name of the new pattern arrangement

functions.name: move
functions.description: Move all windows to an x/y location

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: New x location of the window

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: New y location of the window

functions.name: scatter
functions.description: Move all windows to a random x/y location within limits

functions.name: size
functions.description: Resize all windows to a specific w/h

functions.name: refresh
functions.description: Refresh all windows in this wall

functions.name: load
functions.description: Load a URL.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: URL to load. No http:// necessary.

constructor.name: Window
constructor.description: Window object managed by a Wall

functions.name: toPolar
functions.description: Receives cartesian coordinates and returns polar coordinates as an object with 'radius' and 'angle' properties.

functions.name: toCartesian
functions.description: Receives polar coordinates and returns cartesian coordinates as an object with 'x' and 'y' properties.

functions.name: clip
functions.description: Limits a number to within low and high values.

functions.name: prune
functions.description: Limits a float to within a certain number of decimal places

functions.name: scale
functions.description: Scales an input number to a new range of numbers

parameters.name: high2
parameters.description:
output range (high)
    ```js
    nx.scale(5,0,10,0,100) // returns 50
    nx.scale(5,0,10,1,2) // returns 1.5
    ```

functions.name: invert
functions.description: Equivalent to nx.scale(input,0,1,1,0). Inverts a normalized (0-1) number.

functions.name: mtof
functions.description: MIDI to frequency conversion. Returns frequency in Hz.

functions.name: random
functions.description: Returns a random integer between 0 and a given scale parameter.

functions.name: interp
functions.description: Interpolate between two numbers, using 0-1 as input.

functions.name: randomColor
functions.description: SHOULD BE RENAMED/SHORTENED Get a random color value

functions.name: interval
functions.description: interval with controllable speed / interval time

functions.name: rand
functions.description: random function that executes (returns new num) each time
